CmAks.name: Max retry count
CmAks.label: Max retry count
CmAks.description: Max Retry Count for job fail
CmAks.sectionDescription: retry section controls the retry policy.

CmAks.name: GpuCount
CmAks.label: Gpu count
CmAks.description: Gpu count Defines how many gpu cores a single node gpu job will use. Default value is 1.

CmAks.name: CpuCount
CmAks.label: Cpu count
CmAks.description: Cpu count defines how many cpu cores that a single node cpu job will use. Default value is 1.

CmAks.name: MemoryRequestInGB
CmAks.label: Memory request in gb
CmAks.description: Memory request defines how much GB memory a single node job will request. Default value is 0 which means we will automatically calculate it for user.

CmAks.name: JobPriority
CmAks.label: Job priority
CmAks.description: The priority of a job. Default value is 200. User can set it to 100~200. Any value larger than 200 or less than 100 will be treated as 200.

CmAks.name: IsPreemptible
CmAks.label: Is preemptible
CmAks.description: Whether to preempt extra compute resources beyond the VC quota. Default value is false.

CmAks.name: NodeCountSet
CmAks.label: Node count set
CmAks.description: Node count set determines how compute auto-scale nodes. The value should be a list of integers in ascending order. And Only available when IsPreemptible is true.

CmAks.name: ScaleInterval
CmAks.label: Scale interval
CmAks.description: Scale interval in min

CmAks.name: IsSSHEnabled
CmAks.label: Is ssh enabled
CmAks.description: Whether to enable SSH for interactive development. Default value is false.
CmAks.sectionDescription: Interactive configuration when trying to access the compute.

CmAks.name: SSHPublicKey
CmAks.label: Ssh public key
CmAks.description: Public key to be used for SSH. Only required when SSH is enabled.
CmAks.sectionDescription: Interactive configuration when trying to access the compute.

CmAks.name: IsIPythonEnabled
CmAks.label: Is i python enabled
CmAks.description: Whether to enable Jupyter notebook for interactive development. Default value is false.
CmAks.sectionDescription: Interactive configuration when trying to access the compute.

CmAks.name: IsTensorBoardEnabled
CmAks.label: Is tensor board enabled
CmAks.description: Whether to enable TensorBoard. Default value is false.
CmAks.sectionDescription: Interactive configuration when trying to access the compute.

CmAks.name: InteractivePort
CmAks.label: Interactive port
CmAks.description: Allows user to specify a different interactive port. Available value from 40000 to 49999.
CmAks.sectionDescription: Interactive configuration when trying to access the compute.

runSettingParameters.name: Environment variables
runSettingParameters.label: Environment variables
runSettingParameters.description: Environment variables can be used to specify environment variables to be passed. It is a dictionary of environment name to environment value mapping. User can use this to adjust some component runtime behavior which is not exposed as component parameter, e.g. enable some debug switch.

runSettingParameters.name: Instance count
runSettingParameters.label: Instance count
runSettingParameters.description: Number of instances in the compute target used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Instance type
runSettingParameters.label: Instance type
runSettingParameters.description: Instance type used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.label: Timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum allowed time for the run. The system will attempt to automatically cancel the run if it took longer than this value. Null value means infinite duration.

runSettingParameters.name: Trial timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.label: Trial timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum time in seconds the entire sweep job is allowed to run. Once this limit is reached, the system will cancel the sweep job, including all its trials.

runSettingParameters.name: Node count
runSettingParameters.label: Instance count
runSettingParameters.description: Number of nodes in the compute target used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Use docker
runSettingParameters.label: Use docker
runSettingParameters.description: Specifies whether the environment to run the experiment should be Docker-based. Amlcompute linux clusters require that jobs running inside Docker containers. The backend will override the value to be true for Amlcompute linux clusters.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Shared volumes
runSettingParameters.label: Shared volumes
runSettingParameters.description: Indicates whether to use shared volumes. Set to False if necessary to work around shared volume bugs on Windows. The default is True.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Shm size
runSettingParameters.label: Shm size
runSettingParameters.description: The size of the docker container's shared memory block. This should be in the format of `<number><unit>` where number as to be greater than 0 and the unit can be one of `b` (bytes), `k` (kilobytes), `m` (megabytes), or `g` (gigabytes).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Arguments
runSettingParameters.label: Docker args
runSettingParameters.description: Arguments to pass to the Docker run command.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: AISuperComputer
runSettingParameters.label: AISuperComputer
runSettingParameters.description: The configure details of the compute target "aisupercomputer" to be created during experiment.

runSettingParameters.name: Enabled
runSettingParameters.label: Enabled
runSettingParameters.description: Enable runtime sweep configuration.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Primary metric
runSettingParameters.label: Primary metric
runSettingParameters.description: The name of the primary metric needs to exactly match the name of the metric logged by the training script.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific objective settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Goal
runSettingParameters.label: Goal
runSettingParameters.description: Whether the primary metric will be maximized or minimized when evaluating the runs.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific objective settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Section Enable
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Policy type
runSettingParameters.label: Policy type
runSettingParameters.description: The early termination policy type. Current default means no termination policy.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: SlackFactor
runSettingParameters.label: Slack factor
runSettingParameters.description: the slack ratio allowed with respect to the best performing training run.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: SlackAmount
runSettingParameters.label: Slack amount
runSettingParameters.description: the slack amount allowed with respect to the best performing training run.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: EvaluationInterval
runSettingParameters.label: Evaluation interval
runSettingParameters.description: the frequency for applying the policy.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: DelayEvaluation
runSettingParameters.label: Delay evaluation
runSettingParameters.description: delays the first policy evaluation for a specified number of intervals.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: BanditSlackSettingName
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: BanditSlackSettingValue
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: TruncationPercentage
runSettingParameters.label: Truncation percentage
runSettingParameters.description: the percentage of lowest performing runs to terminate at each evaluation interval. An integer value between 1 and 99.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Algorithm
runSettingParameters.label: Algorithm
runSettingParameters.description: Specify the parameter sampling method to use over the hyperparameter search space. Possible values are [random, grid, bayesian].
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Grid Type
runSettingParameters.label: Type
runSettingParameters.description: Specify different types of hyperparameter distributions. The distributions are defined when you configure sampling for a hyperparameter sweep.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Random Type
runSettingParameters.label: Type
runSettingParameters.description: Specify different types of hyperparameter distributions. The distributions are defined when you configure sampling for a hyperparameter sweep.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Bayesian Type
runSettingParameters.label: Type
runSettingParameters.description: Specify different types of hyperparameter distributions. The distributions are defined when you configure sampling for a hyperparameter sweep.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Values
runSettingParameters.label: Values
runSettingParameters.description: The list of options to choose from.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Values
runSettingParameters.label: Values
runSettingParameters.description: The list of options to choose from.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Upper
runSettingParameters.label: Upper
runSettingParameters.description: The exclusive upper bound for the range of integers.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MinValue
runSettingParameters.label: Min value
runSettingParameters.description: The minimum value in the range (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MaxValue
runSettingParameters.label: Max value
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum value in the range (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Q
runSettingParameters.label: Q
runSettingParameters.description: The smoothing factor.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MinValue
runSettingParameters.label: Min value
runSettingParameters.description: The minimum value in the range will be exp(min_value)(inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MaxValue
runSettingParameters.label: Max value
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum value in the range will be exp(max_value) (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Mu
runSettingParameters.label: Mu
runSettingParameters.description: The mean of the normal distribution.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Sigma
runSettingParameters.label: Sigma
runSettingParameters.description: the standard deviation of the normal distribution.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Values
runSettingParameters.label: Values
runSettingParameters.description: The list of options to choose from.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MinValue
runSettingParameters.label: Min value
runSettingParameters.description: The minimum value in the range (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MaxValue
runSettingParameters.label: Max value
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum value in the range (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Q
runSettingParameters.label: Q
runSettingParameters.description: The smoothing factor.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Max total trials
runSettingParameters.label: Max total trials
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum number of training runs. Must be an integer between 1 and 1000.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific limits settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Max concurrent trials
runSettingParameters.label: Max concurrent trials
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum number of runs that can run concurrently. If not specified, all runs launch in parallel. If specified, must be an integer between 1 and 100.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific limits settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Timeout minutes
runSettingParameters.label: Timeout minutes
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum duration, in minutes, of the hyperparameter tuning experiment. Runs after this duration are canceled.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific limits settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Sweep timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.label: Timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum time in seconds the entire sweep job is allowed to run. Once this limit is reached, the system will cancel the sweep job, including all its trials.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific limits settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Target
runSettingParameters.label: Compute
runSettingParameters.description: The compute target to use

runSettingParameters.name: Environment variables
runSettingParameters.label: Environment variables
runSettingParameters.description: Environment variables can be used to specify environment variables to be passed. It is a dictionary of environment name to environment value mapping. User can use this to adjust some component runtime behavior which is not exposed as component parameter, e.g. enable some debug switch.

runSettingParameters.name: Instance count
runSettingParameters.label: Instance count
runSettingParameters.description: Number of instances in the compute target used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Instance type
runSettingParameters.label: Instance type
runSettingParameters.description: Instance type used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.label: Timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum allowed time for the run. The system will attempt to automatically cancel the run if it took longer than this value. Null value means infinite duration.

runSettingParameters.name: Trial timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.label: Trial timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum time in seconds the entire sweep job is allowed to run. Once this limit is reached, the system will cancel the sweep job, including all its trials.

runSettingParameters.name: Node count
runSettingParameters.label: Instance count
runSettingParameters.description: Number of nodes in the compute target used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Use docker
runSettingParameters.label: Use docker
runSettingParameters.description: Specifies whether the environment to run the experiment should be Docker-based. Amlcompute linux clusters require that jobs running inside Docker containers. The backend will override the value to be true for Amlcompute linux clusters.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Shared volumes
runSettingParameters.label: Shared volumes
runSettingParameters.description: Indicates whether to use shared volumes. Set to False if necessary to work around shared volume bugs on Windows. The default is True.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Shm size
runSettingParameters.label: Shm size
runSettingParameters.description: The size of the docker container's shared memory block. This should be in the format of `<number><unit>` where number as to be greater than 0 and the unit can be one of `b` (bytes), `k` (kilobytes), `m` (megabytes), or `g` (gigabytes).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Arguments
runSettingParameters.label: Docker args
runSettingParameters.description: Arguments to pass to the Docker run command.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: AISuperComputer
runSettingParameters.label: AISuperComputer
runSettingParameters.description: The configure details of the compute target "aisupercomputer" to be created during experiment.

runSettingParameters.name: Enabled
runSettingParameters.label: Enabled
runSettingParameters.description: Enable runtime sweep configuration.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Primary metric
runSettingParameters.label: Primary metric
runSettingParameters.description: The name of the primary metric needs to exactly match the name of the metric logged by the training script.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific objective settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Goal
runSettingParameters.label: Goal
runSettingParameters.description: Whether the primary metric will be maximized or minimized when evaluating the runs.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific objective settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Section Enable
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Policy type
runSettingParameters.label: Policy type
runSettingParameters.description: The early termination policy type. Current default means no termination policy.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: SlackFactor
runSettingParameters.label: Slack factor
runSettingParameters.description: the slack ratio allowed with respect to the best performing training run.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: SlackAmount
runSettingParameters.label: Slack amount
runSettingParameters.description: the slack amount allowed with respect to the best performing training run.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: EvaluationInterval
runSettingParameters.label: Evaluation interval
runSettingParameters.description: the frequency for applying the policy.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: DelayEvaluation
runSettingParameters.label: Delay evaluation
runSettingParameters.description: delays the first policy evaluation for a specified number of intervals.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: BanditSlackSettingName
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: BanditSlackSettingValue
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: TruncationPercentage
runSettingParameters.label: Truncation percentage
runSettingParameters.description: the percentage of lowest performing runs to terminate at each evaluation interval. An integer value between 1 and 99.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Algorithm
runSettingParameters.label: Algorithm
runSettingParameters.description: Specify the parameter sampling method to use over the hyperparameter search space. Possible values are [random, grid, bayesian].
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Grid Type
runSettingParameters.label: Type
runSettingParameters.description: Specify different types of hyperparameter distributions. The distributions are defined when you configure sampling for a hyperparameter sweep.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Random Type
runSettingParameters.label: Type
runSettingParameters.description: Specify different types of hyperparameter distributions. The distributions are defined when you configure sampling for a hyperparameter sweep.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Bayesian Type
runSettingParameters.label: Type
runSettingParameters.description: Specify different types of hyperparameter distributions. The distributions are defined when you configure sampling for a hyperparameter sweep.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Values
runSettingParameters.label: Values
runSettingParameters.description: The list of options to choose from.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Values
runSettingParameters.label: Values
runSettingParameters.description: The list of options to choose from.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Upper
runSettingParameters.label: Upper
runSettingParameters.description: The exclusive upper bound for the range of integers.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MinValue
runSettingParameters.label: Min value
runSettingParameters.description: The minimum value in the range (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MaxValue
runSettingParameters.label: Max value
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum value in the range (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Q
runSettingParameters.label: Q
runSettingParameters.description: The smoothing factor.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MinValue
runSettingParameters.label: Min value
runSettingParameters.description: The minimum value in the range will be exp(min_value)(inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MaxValue
runSettingParameters.label: Max value
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum value in the range will be exp(max_value) (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Mu
runSettingParameters.label: Mu
runSettingParameters.description: The mean of the normal distribution.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Sigma
runSettingParameters.label: Sigma
runSettingParameters.description: the standard deviation of the normal distribution.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Values
runSettingParameters.label: Values
runSettingParameters.description: The list of options to choose from.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MinValue
runSettingParameters.label: Min value
runSettingParameters.description: The minimum value in the range (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: MaxValue
runSettingParameters.label: Max value
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum value in the range (inclusive).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Q
runSettingParameters.label: Q
runSettingParameters.description: The smoothing factor.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific search space settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Max total trials
runSettingParameters.label: Max total trials
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum number of training runs. Must be an integer between 1 and 1000.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific limits settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Max concurrent trials
runSettingParameters.label: Max concurrent trials
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum number of runs that can run concurrently. If not specified, all runs launch in parallel. If specified, must be an integer between 1 and 100.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific limits settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Timeout minutes
runSettingParameters.label: Timeout minutes
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum duration, in minutes, of the hyperparameter tuning experiment. Runs after this duration are canceled.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific limits settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Sweep timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.label: Timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum time in seconds the entire sweep job is allowed to run. Once this limit is reached, the system will cancel the sweep job, including all its trials.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific limits settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Target
runSettingParameters.label: Compute
runSettingParameters.description: The compute target to use

AmlK8s.name: GpuCount
AmlK8s.label: Gpu count
AmlK8s.description: Gpu count Defines how many gpu cores a single node gpu job will use. Default value is 1.

AmlK8s.name: CpuCount
AmlK8s.label: Cpu count
AmlK8s.description: Cpu count defines how many cpu cores that a single node cpu job will use. Default value is 1.

AmlK8s.name: MemoryRequestInGB
AmlK8s.label: Memory request in gb
AmlK8s.description: Memory request defines how much GB memory a single node job will request. Default value is 0 which means we will automatically calculate it for user.

AmlK8s.name: JobPriority
AmlK8s.label: Job priority
AmlK8s.description: The priority of a job. Default value is 200. User can set it to 100~200. Any value larger than 200 or less than 100 will be treated as 200.

AmlK8s.name: IsPreemptible
AmlK8s.label: Is preemptible
AmlK8s.description: Whether to preempt extra compute resources beyond the VC quota. Default value is false.

AmlK8s.name: NodeCountSet
AmlK8s.label: Node count set
AmlK8s.description: Node count set determines how compute auto-scale nodes. The value should be a list of integers in ascending order. And Only available when IsPreemptible is true.

AmlK8s.name: ScaleInterval
AmlK8s.label: Scale interval
AmlK8s.description: Scale interval in min

AmlK8s.name: IsSSHEnabled

runSettingParameters.name: Environment variables
runSettingParameters.label: Environment variables
runSettingParameters.description: Environment variables can be used to specify environment variables to be passed. It is a dictionary of environment name to environment value mapping. User can use this to adjust some component runtime behavior which is not exposed as component parameter, e.g. enable some debug switch.

runSettingParameters.name: Instance count
runSettingParameters.label: Instance count
runSettingParameters.description: Number of instances in the compute target used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Instance type
runSettingParameters.label: Instance type
runSettingParameters.description: Instance type used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.label: Timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.description: Maximum allowed time for the run. The system will attempt to automatically cancel the run if it took longer than this value. Null value means infinite duration.

runSettingParameters.name: Trial timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.label: Trial timeout seconds
runSettingParameters.description: The maximum time in seconds the entire sweep job is allowed to run. Once this limit is reached, the system will cancel the sweep job, including all its trials.

runSettingParameters.name: Node count
runSettingParameters.label: Instance count
runSettingParameters.description: Number of nodes in the compute target used for training.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Use docker
runSettingParameters.label: Use docker
runSettingParameters.description: Specifies whether the environment to run the experiment should be Docker-based. Amlcompute linux clusters require that jobs running inside Docker containers. The backend will override the value to be true for Amlcompute linux clusters.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Shared volumes
runSettingParameters.label: Shared volumes
runSettingParameters.description: Indicates whether to use shared volumes. Set to False if necessary to work around shared volume bugs on Windows. The default is True.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Shm size
runSettingParameters.label: Shm size
runSettingParameters.description: The size of the docker container's shared memory block. This should be in the format of `<number><unit>` where number as to be greater than 0 and the unit can be one of `b` (bytes), `k` (kilobytes), `m` (megabytes), or `g` (gigabytes).
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: Arguments
runSettingParameters.label: Docker args
runSettingParameters.description: Arguments to pass to the Docker run command.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: resource section controls the number of nodes, cpus, gpus, docker configurations the job will consume.

runSettingParameters.name: AISuperComputer
runSettingParameters.label: AISuperComputer
runSettingParameters.description: The configure details of the compute target "aisupercomputer" to be created during experiment.

runSettingParameters.name: Enabled
runSettingParameters.label: Enabled
runSettingParameters.description: Enable runtime sweep configuration.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Primary metric
runSettingParameters.label: Primary metric
runSettingParameters.description: The name of the primary metric needs to exactly match the name of the metric logged by the training script.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific objective settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Goal
runSettingParameters.label: Goal
runSettingParameters.description: Whether the primary metric will be maximized or minimized when evaluating the runs.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific objective settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: Section Enable
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: SlackAmount
runSettingParameters.label: Slack amount
runSettingParameters.description: the slack amount allowed with respect to the best performing training run.

runSettingParameters.name: EvaluationInterval
runSettingParameters.label: Evaluation interval
runSettingParameters.description: the frequency for applying the policy.
runSettingParameters.sectionDescription: This section contains specific early termination settings for sweep component.

runSettingParameters.name: DelayEvaluation
runSettingParameters.label: Delay evaluation
